divs: Sighting DetailsSaw orange lights come on again tonight, came on as single lights at first then after a few minutes came on as a row of 6 lights, we waited about 10-15 more minutes then the lights came on again time in a row of 7. PLEASE GO OUT THERE TOMORROW AROUND 7:30PM, dont get impatient. Watch the sky ..they'll be back. NOT PLANES, NOT FLARES! No planes were in the sky at all. They stayed lit for about 2 seconds then went out.
trends: There have been 63 other sightings in Abilene
There were no other sightings in Abilene on or around March 2nd 2011
